name: Orrstead (itch)
description:
This is an early alpha build of Phase 1, made free for playtesting. Game-breaking bugs may exist. Your feedback is highly appreciated! If you like this game, you can support it by wishlisting on Steam.

Orrstead is a city-building simulation game where your goal is to construct Orr - progress through eras of technology, and grow your kingdom from a small village to a sprawling empire.

Gather resources and build houses, farms, and taverns to keep your citizens happy, increasing the rate at which your kingdom grows. As you unlock technologies, possibilities will grow, as will citizens' demands.

Your goal in Orrstead is to construct Orr, the center of your kingdom. As you complete each phase of construction, a new era of technology will be unlocked. Advance from chopping trees and building with wood, to mining and building with stone, and so on. Will you be able to complete the construction of Orr?

Controls

  • WASD - Move camera
  • Q/E - Rotate camera
  • Middle click - Orbit camera
